description.translate: Only waits for a master to absolve evil.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Hache bénie\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7N'attend qu'un maître pour\"}","{\"text\":\"§7absoudre le mal.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Only waits for a master\"}","{\"text\":\"§7to absolve evil.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HER§c-1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
